question:
Change these Reported Speech into Direct Speech    1. She said she had never seen a comet.

 2. They said it had been a wonderful time.

 3. My father asked me who I played with.

 4. He told us he was going to do judo

 5. He told me he had to help his father.

 Change the Direct Speech into Reported Speech

 1. Mum asked : "Have you got the keys?"

 2. He said ; "You should listen to the teacher."

 3. The police : "Don't park here!"

 4. Susan : "Who has drunk the water?"

 5. They asked : "Why didn't you play with us?"

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Reported to Direct:

1. "I had never seen a comet," she said.

2. "It has been a wonderful time," they said.

3. My father asked me, "Who did you play with?"

4. "I'm going to do judo," he told us.

5. He said, "I have to help my father"

Direct to Reported:

1. My mum asked me if I got the keys.

2. He told me that I should listen to the teacher.

3. The police said to not park here.

4. Susan asked who had drunk the water.

5. They asked me why I didn't play with them.

night to do the Science project as we have
planned. My grandmother just came and she
wants me to accompany her to my aunt's
house. I will meet you at school tomorrow.
Erinda

6. "... she wants me to accompany her...
The underlined word refers to...
A. Sasha's grandmother
B. Erinda's grandmother
C. My grandmother
D. My aunt
his text is for questions 7-8
ANNOUNCEMENT

I will    Pilihan Ganda

related_questions.question:
B. Complete the sentences below using the past perfect in the negative and the    words provided.
Ex. My house was very dirty when she came over because.... (Il not clean/ for
weeks) My house was very dirty when she came over because I hadn't
cleaned it for weeks.
1. Joe had to study hard for yesterday's test because... (he/not do well/ the week before)
2. I was worried when she didn't arrive on time because... (she/ not be/ late/ before)
3. Judy didn't want to go on the school ski trip because .... (she/not ski/ before)
4. I didn't recognize Ellen at the party because.... (I not/see/ for years)
5. John didn't catch the bus because.... (he/not leave/ the house/ on time​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Lengkapi kalimat di bawah ini dengan menggunakan past perfect dalam bentuk negatif dan the

kata-kata yang disediakan.

Ex. Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena .... (Saya tidak bersih / untuk

minggu) Rumah saya sangat kotor ketika dia datang karena saya tidak

dibersihkan selama berminggu-minggu.

1. Joe harus belajar keras untuk ujian kemarin karena... (dia/tidak mengerjakannya dengan baik/ minggu sebelumnya)

2. Saya khawatir ketika dia tidak datang tepat waktu karena... (dia/ tidak/ terlambat/ sebelumnya)

3. Judy tidak mau ikut perjalanan ski sekolah karena .... (dia/tidak bermain ski/ sebelumnya)

4. Saya tidak mengenali Ellen di pesta karena.... (Saya tidak/melihat/ selama bertahun-tahun)

5. John tidak naik bus karena.... (dia/tidak berangkat/ rumah/ tepat waktu

Penjelasan:

semoga membantu

related_questions.question:
I invite my friends on my birthday.    Change to passive voice!

a.

My friends is invite by me on my birthday.

b.

I was invited my friends by me on my birthday.

c.

My friends are invited by me on my birthday.

d.

I am invited my friends by me on my birthday.

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a.

My friends is invite by me on my birthday.

tolongin yah besok di kumpulin​
